summary: Tested all 10 improvements requested: Search, Compare, Blog, Favorites, Real-time indicators, More Ads, PWA, Embed Widgets, In-feed ads, Navigation updates. All features working correctly.

1_search_filter_system.details: Global search in header works, returns relevant channels (tested MrBeast search returning 5 results), case-insensitive search working

2_more_ad_placements.sidebar_ad: Visible on channel detail page on desktop (sticky position)
2_more_ad_placements.in_feed_ads: 12 sponsored ads appear in leaderboard (every 10 rows), 139 total rows
2_more_ad_placements.sticky_mobile_ad: Shows on mobile viewport (<768px), fixed at bottom of screen

3_pwa_support.manifest_json: Accessible at /manifest.json with all required PWA fields
3_pwa_support.service_worker: Accessible at /sw.js with install, activate, fetch handlers

5_real_time_data_indicators.live_indicator: Green pulsing dot with 'Live' text on channel page
5_real_time_data_indicators.last_updated: 'Updated Xh ago' timestamp on channel page
5_real_time_data_indicators.animated_counters: AnimatedCounter component available for subscriber counts

6_blog_section.note: Blog posts are static mock data in App.js

9_performance_optimizations.lazy_loading: Images use loading='lazy' attribute on blog articles, channel cards, favorites

context_for_next_testing_agent: All 10 improvements implemented and working. Blog posts are MOCKED (static data in App.js). Favorites use localStorage. PWA manifest and service worker accessible. AdSense uses placeholder IDs. Compare tool uses URL params (?ids=id1,id2).
mocked_apis_note: Blog posts are hardcoded static data in App.js (blogPosts array). Not connected to any backend API.
